welcome.subtitle: How can I help you today? Ask me a question or choose a suggestion.

input.placeholderWrite: Describe what you want to create or change...
input.placeholderPlan: Describe your goal and I'll create a plan...

showEntities.title: Show entities
showEntities.query: Show me all entities from Hamburg

countDocuments.title: Count documents
countDocuments.query: How many documents were added this week?

startCrawl.title: Start crawl
startCrawl.query: Start crawl for all RSS sources

crawlerStatus.title: Crawler status
crawlerStatus.query: What is the current crawler status?

whatsNew.title: What's new?
whatsNew.query: What's new since my last login?

createSummary.title: Create summary
createSummary.query: Create a summary of the top entities

weeklyChanges.title: Weekly changes
weeklyChanges.query: Show me important changes this week

messages.complete: Done! Is there anything else I can help you with?
messages.error: An error occurred. Please try again.
